1492850.name: Mulligans Golf Game
1492850.description:
Mulligans Golf Game is a wacky, arcade golfing game. Gameplay is designed to give the player complete freedom to play how they want in the world of a simplified yet challenging golfing experience. It is not a Sim! But it is designed to provide the scenarios and emotions that come when playing real golf. Players choose from the available pool of legendary characters and hand crafted courses, either playing solo or with friends up to 3 Friends (local split screen or online), attempting to set new Personal Bests, going for Course Records (local and global leaderboards), or challenging friends to see who is the best!

For a detailed Road map for the game, please visit our Discord

Below is a breakdown of what to expect for features from the game! 

Early Access Release (V0.7) Features

Legendary Characters

  • Skins to unlock for each by levelling

  • Character Personal Best Score tracking per Course

  • Handicaps tracked for determining World Ranking

Multiple ways to Golf

  • Tutorial, Single Player, Split Screen (up to 4 player), Online (up to 8 player)

  • Variety of Golf Match types, modes and settings

More Maps to Play!

  • A variety of Courses to play

  • Download and play Community Designed Maps!

  • Local and Global Leaderboards for every Course

Golf Carts

  • Rentable Golf Carts that can be used to traverse the Courses (or run over your friends)

Mini Games

  • Driving Range will be provide different game modes to improve your skills or challenge friends

  • Putting Green will provide different game modes to improve your skills or challenge friends

Tournaments!

  • These will happen monthly with a range of courses and settings

Dynamic Environments

  • Day and Night modes

  • Dynamic Weather (wind & rain)

Early Access Update (V0.8) Features

In Game Course Designer (Sandbox Style)

  • Design Courses with the help of up to 3 others locally or online

  • Play your Custom maps with your friends by hosting games

  • 1 Map Type with a range of assets to design your courses with

Community Courses!

  • Upload your Custom Maps to the Community Database for others to play!

  • Download and play Community Designed Maps! 

Community Maps based tournaments

Early Access Update (V0.9) Features

AI Competitors

Play against Computer characters with ranging difficulty

Full Release (V1.0) Features

Custom Characters

  • Create your own character

  • Progressions System

  • Customize your character

Golfing

As a player, you are given all the tools you need, but must make the decision on what kind of shot (normal, punch, flop, chip), how to shape it (hook, straight, slice), and how hard to hit it. The game will not tell you any more than recommending a club to use. So lineup and take a few practice swings to determine your plan of attack. Practice swings will update the estimated shot trajectory, allowing you to determine if your current approach is going to work. Then it is up to you to replicate your practice swing once addressing the ball. And if you mess it up, hopefully you have one of your Mulligans available to redo it.

Characters

Step into the world of Mulligans, where the Aliens have come from outer space to figure out how to teach Humans the incredible game of golf. It is a challenging task, but hopefully their disciples (you) are up to the challenge!

Choose from 11 Legendary characters to play with, each with their own set of Golf Skills. Use the Dummy, designed for testing out golf training programs. One of the Stickmen/Women, minions of the Aliens. designed as competitors for the humans to play against. Alien Bob himself, the extra terrestrial leader sent to guide the humans to golfing excellence. Or take on an extra challenge and play as the Caveman or Cavewoman found on Earth, that he must teach how to golf!

Courses

There are 8 Hand Crafted Golf Courses to play, each providing its own challenge! They cover a range of difficulties, allowing you to find the ones that provide a good balance of fun and challenge for your Skills!
